resources.string: With Bluetooth disabled, eRouška cannot create a list of nearby phones.\n\nEnable it by pressing \"Enable Bluetooth\".
Application is running in the background and monitoring the surroundings. Please do not force stop the application. Keep Bluetooth enabled and use your phone as usual.
You will be warned in case of suspected COVID-19 infection and we will give you all needed information.
Last data update happened on %1$s and you weren\'t in contact with anyone infected.

Application is now paused and is not collecting any data about other eRouška applications in your vicinity.\n\nEnable data collection and keep yourself and others safe. Don\'t forget to do that especially when leaving your home.
eRouška needs Bluetooth to function properly
Bluetooth is part of Location Services. That\'s why we ask for permission to use Location tracking after you press \"Enable\". Confirm both requests so that the application can function properly.
You are the only one who can upload the collected data, and only when asked to do so by a public health officer.
You don\'t have to worry: the application is not tracking your location nor does it save it.

Since version 2.0 application eRouška is developed my the Ministry of Health in collaboration with National agency for communication and information technologies (NAKIT). Earlier versions of eRouška application were developed by a team of volunteers from COVID19CZ community. Most of original eRouška developers continue in development of newer versions in NAKIT team.
The permission for location tracking needs to be granted to allow the application work properly.
You can find more information about why that is in Help.

The application will be monitoring your surroundings continuously and will record all other phones of users with the eRouška application you encounter.

If any of them test positive for COVID-19, a public health officer will call you.

If you test positive, the public health office will contact all the other application users you encountered.

The independent audit guarantees that the application does not send any personal data without your knowledge. Only you may send them and only to the public health officers.
Thanks to eRou\u0161ka you will keep yourself and others safe

Hi, I\'m using application eRou\u0161ka. Install it too and together we can help stop the spread of COVID-19. The application collects anonymous data about nearby phones so that the public health officers can find potentially positive people more easily. The more we are, the better it works. Application can be found at %s.
Your device seems to be offline.
We value your privacy, sharing data is under your control
eRouška doesn\'t have any personal information about you and collects only anonymous data about other eRouška applications in your vicinity.

Multiple independent audits guarantee that the application doesn\'t share your data without your consent. Only you can share your collected data when administration of public health office requests them.
Check yout internet connection and try again to activate your application. If problems persist, contact us at info@erouska.cz
In case of positive COVID-19 test you will be contacted by worker of public health office. You will be sent SMS message containing verification code for sneding data.
Request new SMS message with new verification code from public health office administration.
Check your internet connection and try again.
Thank you for fighting against the spread of COVID-19.
Please cooperate with workers of public health office on searching all people you were in contact with.
Follow instructions of health office administration and medical staff.
It\'s been some time since your eRouška updated its data about being in contact with infected users. Connect to the internet.
You\'ve been recently in contact with someone COVID-19 positive tested. Watch your healthiness, more info in the app.
eRouška can\'t communicate with other eRouška applications in your vicinity.\n\nEnable COVID-19 exposure notifications using "Enable" button.
We are preparing eRouška to be able to communicate with other similar application around the world. That\'s why we made few changes which we will now introduce.
If you come in contact with anyone with confirmed COVID-19 infection, eRouška will notify you and advise how to proceed.
We won\'t require phone numbers anymore
We are canceling phone number register because they won\'t be necessary to communicate with public health office anymore. eRouška will recommend next steps in case of contact with infected person.
With these changes, terms of usage were changed too. The main change being no longer having to register phone numbers of any eRouška users and it won\'t be needed for registration.
Latest version of Google Play Services is needed to activate notifications about meeting someone with confirmed COVID-19 disease.
For its correct function eRouška needs to enable COVID-19 exposure notifications
These notifications will warn you in case of you being in contact with eRouška user with positive COVID-19 test.
Basis of correct function is sharing and collection of random identification numbers which are automatically generated. eRouška users can\'t be identified using these identification numbers.
